title: Jennifer
summary: Steve and Jared are in his car, parked in the lot.

beats.summary: Steve hears a punk rock song she likes. She turns the car radio up, and begins dancing and bouncing in the passenger seat, singing along. Jared watches with a smile, mesmerized by her energy. He laughs as she makes animated dance moves at him.
Steve begins opening up to Jared. She expresses vulnerability, signaling growing intimacy and trust.
Jennifer and Jared sit contently. Jared tells Jennifer he respects her decision to hide her name, and how special he feels that she shared it with him.
